script: आज भी यह पूरी तरह तैयार नहीं है… सिस्टम… सक्रिय हो? मुझे स्कूल के लिए देर नहीं होनी चाहिए।

scenes.imagePrompt: Hand-drawn anime style. Wide shot. A dreamy, painterly sky at dawn, filled with soft pink and orange clouds. A young, non-realistically proportioned character, dressed in light under-suit, descends gently. A stylized, softly glowing blue energy core is visible through a device on their chest. Gentle lighting emphasizes the fantasy sci-fi tone.
scenes.imageToVideoPrompt: Slow, gentle descent (dolly shot following the character). Ambient sound of soft wind and energy hum. NARATION (Hindi, calm, deep voice): 'आज भी यह पूरी तरह तैयार नहीं है…' CHARACTER (softly, focused): 'सिस्टम… सक्रिय हो? मुझे स्कूल के लिए देर नहीं होनी चाहिए।'

scenes.imagePrompt: Close-up/Mid-shot. The character hovers momentarily. Three stylized, glowing mechanical arms (non-realistic, simplified design) rapidly extend from the character's back/waist. The arms swiftly assemble a standard school uniform (white shirt, tie, grey trousers) around the character mid-air. The character's stylized boots emit a controlled, soft blue light for stabilization.
scenes.imageToVideoPrompt: Quick, fluid animation sequence showing the automated dressing process. Fast, gentle whirring sounds accompanying the mechanical arms. The character remains calm and focused during the assembly.

scenes.imagePrompt: Wide, dynamic shot. The character, now fully dressed in the school uniform, performs a smooth, silent flight above stylized, painterly rooftops of a quiet town. The mechanical arms have retracted completely. The flight is fast but graceful. The background elements (rooftops, trees) are soft and slightly blurred, emphasizing motion.
scenes.imageToVideoPrompt: Smooth tracking shot following the flight path. Sound of wind rush quickly fades, replaced by soft, distant ambient sounds of the waking town below. The character maintains a neutral, focused expression.

scenes.imagePrompt: Mid-shot. The character executes a perfect, gentle landing on a patch of grass near a stylized school gate. The glow from the chest core instantly dims and vanishes beneath the uniform shirt. The stylized flight boots seamlessly and instantly transform into normal-looking school shoes. The technology disappears without a trace.
scenes.imageToVideoPrompt: Quick zoom-in on the landing. A subtle, soft 'thud' sound effect. The ambient sound shifts to distant school chatter and the ringing of a school bell.

scenes.imagePrompt: Medium shot. The character walks casually into the schoolyard, blending in perfectly with other stylized, non-detailed background students. He looks like a normal child. Close-up on the chest area (under the shirt fabric): a small, animated red and yellow warning symbol (a stylized glitch icon) flickers briefly on the now-hidden energy core, visible only to the audience, before vanishing completely.
scenes.imageToVideoPrompt: Normal walking motion. Sound of typical schoolyard chatter and footsteps. A subtle, high-pitched electronic 'ping' accompanies the brief flicker of the warning symbol. Hold on the character blending into the crowd.
